name: places/ChIJ1bi4eZz2wokRQN0l_v9vN14
formattedAddress: 21 Audubon Ave, New York, NY 10032, USA
adrFormatAddress: 21 Audubon Ave, New York, NY 10032, USA

originalText.text: I wouldn’t go this hospitals emergency room if you didn’t have to. Super slow, under staffed and empty!? Not sure why it took me almost 5hrs to see a doctor  from signing in but I won’t do it again. Still after seeing the doctor took 2hrs to get medical attention. A total of 7hrs and still feel the same pain I walked in with. Unbearable and despicable. The staff didn’t seem to care much neither, like their hands were tied and there was nothing they could do, nor wanted to do. More staff would help this hospital tremendously!!! Please apply!! They must be seeking employees.

originalText.text: Poor bedside manner from the staff that works here. The staff looks unhappy everywhere you walk and are rude. The Emergency department is a tremendous mess and you may not be seen by a doctor for hours despite what your in for. Walking into the NYPH is scary due to the increase amount of homeless people in the area asking you for money and following you around. Very dissatisfied with this hospital! Not sure where or how they are considered #1.

originalText.text:
Still have PTSD from the experience of THREE "doctors" trying to get intravenous in me.
Third was angry n stuck it IN MY INDREX FINGER???
No apologies and I can't even let aneedle near me.

originalText.text: This urgicare is discriminatory.  I'm documenting everything in my journal and present it to the Hospital Board. 21 Audobon clerical staff needs an overhaul.  I work for a huge hospital and never have I felt discrimination. I'm appalled
